resources.string:
Pull Navigration Drawer by right swipe. 
 
Go to the Image Url Fragment. 
 
Paste the url of your Image. 
 
Click on the Preview Button. 
 
Width and Height of the image will be automatically fetched. 
 
You can change the width and height of the image if you want. 
 
Click on the start btn. 
 
Draw the cloud of part of the image. 
 
Use the icons for helps like to fill the color you can choose bigger brush, or you can use undo and redo options. 
 
Click on remove background btn to remove the background and make the drawing opaque. 
 
Click on the save btn for saving the image on your device. 
 
You can share the image by clicking the share button, Local copy of the image shared will be saved in the device.
